title: Ambient Music Pack (Adaptable and Loopable)
description: This pack contains 7 instrumental tracks, each piece has a calm and peaceful vibe. Each track is adaptable and 4 tracks can be looped seamlessly. Includes a combination of orchestral, synthesizer, guitar, piano and percussive instrumentation.
longDescription:
Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TAeQWutfwG0

This music pack is the perfect ambient music to have looping and adapting as your game progresses. This music will help further the immersive experience and enhance the emotional impact of your whole game.
The track list is:
Zero Gravity (Adaptable & Loopable) - 1:39
Zen (Adaptable & Loopable) - 2:12
Moon Gaze (Adaptable & Loopable) - 4:01
Daydream (Adaptable) - 4:37
Creatures of the Forest (Adaptable & Loopable) - 2:19
Journey (Adaptable) - 1:53
Slow Journey (Adaptable) - 2:18 16:41
Note: 'Slow Journey' is the same piece as 'Journey', just slowed down to have a calm and relaxed sound.
Each track includes a separate audio file for each different instrument section to allow for adaptable music in your games to create more diverse sounds that can can heavily impact the immersive experience in your game.
Alongside each audio track I have also included the audio files for each song as a whole, with each piece being played as its original arrangement. These can be used in the scenario of a creator not needing their music looped or adaptable.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 7
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz. 16bit. Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes & No.
How many minutes of audio provided: 18:59
Documentation Included: Yes
Important\Additional Notes:
Attached is instructional documentation on each piece which explains each piece is to be played.
